channel.title: Allstar help (I am new be patient please)
channel.description:
I need a way to fix the rares box where normal players can get rares (atm i have it so if anyone trys to get the rares is sends a message to the server. I would like it so staff can get rares.
Trade dupe fix (THE MAIN THING I HAVE BEEN LOOKING FOR) i have tryed and tryed and tryed to fix this dupe i always get compiling errors because my coding is horrible
How do i delete telegrab?
Please leave a comment down below of some guidence and/or snippets and i will be greatful

item.title: Allstar help (I am new be patient please)
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

[quote=“xXSh0ckXx, post:5, topic:539535”][quote author=Revamp dis Shit link=topic=658375.msg4404475#msg4404475 date=1391480806]

I need a way to fix the rares box where normal players can get rares (atm i have it so if anyone trys to get the rares is sends a message to the server. I would like it so staff can get rares.

Trade dupe fix (THE MAIN THING I HAVE BEEN LOOKING FOR) i have tryed and tryed and tryed to fix this dupe i always get compiling errors because my coding is horrible

How do i delete telegrab?

Please leave a comment down below of some guidence and/or snippets and i will be greatful

Explain the dupe / show some code of tradeandduel.java (Idk where trading is handled @delta) and why would you delete telegrab?

You’re talking about a completely different source bud… but Angel why do you need help with this? You still running slayerscaper?

Just PM me for my Skype and I’ll fix everything np…
[/quote]
Mate doesn’t delta have a class where trade is handled? As i mentioned “idk where trading is handled @delta” :D[/quote]
Yes it does… in client.java…atleast in this case.

Read full topic
item.source: Allstar help (I am new be patient please)

item.title: Allstar help (I am new be patient please)
item.dc:creator: @FizzerX637 FizzerX637
item.description:
@FizzerX637 wrote:

dylaster5:

I need a way to fix the rares box where normal players can get rares (atm i have it so if anyone trys to get the rares is sends a message to the server. I would like it so staff can get rares.

You need to add player rights on the box, so that only certain people can get the rares.

use that and mods+ can get the items.

Read full topic
